title: Get geographical — get_geographical
text: function returns geographical information

title: Get geographical — get_geographical
code: get_geographical(   code = NULL,   resource = "variable",   all = FALSE,   verbose = FALSE,   natcode = NULL,   geocode = NULL,   exponential_notation = FALSE,   help = FALSE )

title: Get geographical — get_geographical
text: code (string) serie id resource (string) resource access, default resource = "variable" get serie metadata. Possible values variable, natcode natcode_to_geocode (boolean) = TRUE get natcodes verbose (boolean) show information process natcode (int) geographical code INE geocode (string) geographical code Eurostat exponential_notation (boolean) show exponential notation. e.g. e+10 help (boolean) type value resource param type help = TRUE see params available resource.

title: Get geographical — get_geographical
code: get_geographical("IPC251522") get_geographical(resource = "variable", help = TRUE) get_geographical("IPC251522", resource = "natcode") get_geographical(natcode = 34050000000, resource = "natcode_to_geocode")

title: Get metadata crossing — get_metadata_crossing
text: function returns data metadata metadata crossing

title: Get metadata crossing — get_metadata_crossing
code: get_metadata_crossing(   code = NULL,   resource = "series",   help = FALSE,   query = NULL,   p = 1,   det = 0,   tip = NULL,   nlast = 1,   lang = "ES" )

title: Get metadata crossing — get_metadata_crossing
text: code (string) operation identificator resource (string) resource access, default resource = "metadata" get serie metadata. Possible values series data help (boolean) type value resource param type help = TRUE see params available resource. query (string) string separated syntax variable = value using natural language p (int) periodicity, p = 1 default det (int) det = 2 see two levels depth, specifically access PubFechaAct object, det = 0 default tip (string) tip = M obtain metadata (crossing variables-values) series nlast last n values lang (string) language used obtain information

title: Get metadata crossing — get_metadata_crossing
code: get_metadata_crossing(resource = "series", help = TRUE) get_metadata_crossing("IPC", resource = "series", query = "Provincias = Madrid AND Tipo de dato = Variacion mensual AND Grupos ECOICOP = NULL") get_metadata_crossing("IPC", resource = "data", query = "Provincias = Madrid AND Tipo de dato = Variacion mensual AND Grupos ECOICOP = NULL", nlast = 5)

title: Get operations — get_operations
text: function returns information operations

title: Get operations — get_operations
code: get_operations(   code = NULL,   resource = "all",   help = FALSE,   ioe = FALSE,   geographical_granularity = NULL,   temporal_granularity = NULL,   verbose = TRUE,   lang = "ES" )

title: Get operations — get_operations
text: code (string) operation identificator resource (string) resource access, default resource = "metadata" get serie metadata. Possible values , metadata, variables_values by_granularity help (boolean) type value resource param type help = TRUE see params available resource. ioe (boolean) TRUE code format IO30138, FALSE default geographical_granularity (string) geographical granularity temporal_granularity (string) temporal granularity verbose (boolean) show information process lang (string) language used obtain information

title: Get operations — get_operations
code: get_operations() get_operations(resource = "all") get_operations(resource = "all", help = TRUE) get_operations("IPC", resource = "metadata") get_operations("IPC", resource = "variables_values") get_operations(resource = "by_granularity", geographical_granularity = "PROV")

title: Get publications — get_publications
text: function returns available publications operation date

title: Get publications — get_publications
code: get_publications(   code = NULL,   resource = "all",   help = FALSE,   det = 0,   ioe = FALSE,   lang = "ES" )

title: Get publications — get_publications
text: code (string) operation publication indentificator resource (string) resource access, default resource = "" get serie metadata. Possible values , operation date help (boolean) type value resource param type help = TRUE see params available resource. det (int) det = 2 see two levels depth, specifically access PubFechaAct object, det = 0 default ioe (boolean) TRUE code format IO30138, FALSE default lang (string) language used obtain information

title: Get publications — get_publications
code: get_publications() get_publications(resource = "all", help = TRUE) get_publications("IPC", resource = "operation") get_publications(8, resource = "date")

title: Get series — get_series
text: function returns data metadata operation, table serie

title: Get series — get_series
code: get_series(   code = NULL,   resource = "metadata",   help = FALSE,   ioe = FALSE,   det = 0,   tip = NULL,   lang = "ES",   date_start = NULL,   date_end = NULL,   nlast = NULL,   classification = NULL,   verbose = FALSE,   benchmark = FALSE,   geographical_granularity = NULL,   temporal_granularity = NULL )

title: Get series — get_series
text: code (string) serie, operation table identificator resource (string) resource access, default resource = "metadata" get serie metadata. Possible values metadata, operation, values, table, metadataoperation, data, by_granularity, by_common_parameters nlast help (boolean) type value resource param type help = TRUE see params available resource. ioe (boolean) TRUE code format IO30138, FALSE default det (int) det = 2 see two levels depth, specifically access PubFechaAct object, det = 0 default tip (string) tip = M obtain metadata (crossing variables-values) series lang (string) language used obtain information date_start (string) start date format YYYY-MM-DD date_end (string) end date format YYYY-MM-DD nlast (int) last n serie values classification (string) serie classification, classification = NULL value auto-detected verbose (boolean) show information process, verbose = FALSE default benchmark (boolean) used measure performance system, benchmark = FALSE default. geographical_granularity (string) geographical granularity temporal_granularity (string) temporal granularity

title: Get series — get_series
code: get_series("IPC206449") get_series(resource = "metadata", help = TRUE) get_series("IPC", resource = "operation") get_series("IPC206449", resource = "values") get_series(22350, resource = "table") get_series("IPC251541", resource = "nlast") get_series("IPC206449", resource = "data", nlast = 5) get_series("IPC", resource = "by_granularity", geographical_granularity = "CCAA", verbose = TRUE) get_series("IPC251539", resource = "by_common_parameters", verbose = TRUE)

title: Get tables — get_tables
text: function returns data / metadata tables

title: Get tables — get_tables
code: get_tables(   code = NULL,   resource = "operation",   help = FALSE,   grp = NULL,   geo = 0,   nlast = 0,   det = 0,   tip = NULL,   ioe = FALSE,   lang = "ES" )

title: Get tables — get_tables
text: code operation (string/int) table (int) identificator resource (string) resource access, default resource = "operation" get tables operation. Possible values operation, group, group_values data help (boolean) type value resource param type help = TRUE see params available resource grp (int) group identification geo (int) use geo = 1 access tables geographic content, geo = 0 default nlast last n values det (int) use det = 2 see two levels depth, specifically access PubFechaAct object, det = 0 default tip (string) use tip = "" view friendly, specifically view field ultima_modificacion use tip = "" obtain metadata (crossing variables-values) series friendly output. ioe (boolean) use ioe = TRUE code format IO30138, FALSE default lang (string) language used obtain information

title: Get tables — get_tables
code: get_tables("IPC") get_tables(resource = "operation", help = TRUE) get_tables(25, resource = "operation") get_tables(22350, resource = "group") get_tables(22350, grp = 81497, resource = "group_values") get_tables(22350, nlast = 5, resource = "data")

title: Get values — get_values
text: function returns values variable variable operation

title: Get values — get_values
code: get_values(   code = NULL,   resource = "all",   operation = NULL,   help = FALSE,   det = 0,   ioe = FALSE,   lang = "ES" )

title: Get values — get_values
text: code (int) variable indentificator resource (string) resource access, default resource = "" get serie metadata. Possible values variable_operation operation (string) operation indentificator help (boolean) type value resource param type help = TRUE see params available resource. det (int) det = 1 see detail variable belongs, det = 0 default ioe (boolean) TRUE code format IO30138, FALSE default lang (string) language used obtain information

title: Get values — get_values
code: get_values(115) get_values(resource = "all", help = TRUE) get_values(762, operation = "IPC", resource = "variable_operation")

title: Get variables — get_variables
text: function returns operations variables

title: Get variables — get_variables
code: get_variables(   code = NULL,   resource = "all",   help = FALSE,   ioe = FALSE,   lang = "ES" )

title: Get variables — get_variables
text: code (string) operation identifier resource (string) resource access, default resource = "metadata" get serie metadata. Possible values operation help (boolean) type value resource param type help = TRUE see params available resource. ioe (boolean) TRUE code format IO30138, FALSE default lang (string) language used obtain information

title: Get variables — get_variables
code: get_variables() get_variables(resource = "all", help = TRUE) get_variables("IPC", resource = "operation")

title: Represent series — represent_series
text: function allows representing series data maps charts

title: Represent series — represent_series
code: represent_series(   code = NULL,   resource = "maps",   help = FALSE,   nlast = 0,   date_start = NULL,   date_end = NULL,   classification = NULL,   map_scale = 60,   verbose = FALSE,   benchmark = FALSE,   det = 0,   type = NA,   lang = "ES" )

title: Represent series — represent_series
text: code (string) serie identificator resource (string) resource access, default resource = "" get serie metadata. Possible values maps, plot highcharts help (boolean) type value resource param type help = TRUE see params available resource. nlast (int) last n serie data, nult = 0 value auto-calculated date_start (date) start date format (string) YYYY-MM-DD date_end (date) end date format (string) YYYY-MM-DD classification (string) serie classification, classification = NULL value auto-detected map_scale (int) refers relationship ratio distance map corresponding distance ground. example, 1:1000000 scale map, 1cm map equals 1km ground. Possible values : 1, 3, 10, 20 60, PROV CCAA geographical granularity, map_scale = 60 default map_scale = NULL high detailed map. verbose (boolean) show information process benchmark (boolean) used measure performance system, benchmark = FALSE default. det (int) det = 2 see two levels depth, specifically access PubFechaAct object, det = 0 default type (string) type plot drawn, type = "p" (points) default. See type plot lang (string) language used obtain information

title: Represent series — represent_series
code: represent_series("IPC251521", resource = "maps") represent_series(resource = "maps", help = TRUE) represent_series("IPC251521", resource = "maps", map_scale = NULL) represent_series("IPC206449", resource = "plot", nlast = 5) represent_series("IPC206449", resource = "highcharts", nlast = 5)

title: Update cache — update_cache
text: function allows update cache data

title: Update cache — update_cache
code: update_cache(   code = NULL,   resource = "series",   help = FALSE,   n = 0,   page = 1,   pagination = TRUE,   page_start = NULL,   page_end = NULL,   benchmark = FALSE,   force = FALSE,   ignore_series = NULL,   tip = "M",   det = 2,   lang = "ES" )

title: Update cache — update_cache
text: code (string) operation identificator resource (string) resource access, default resource = "" get serie metadata. Possible values series help (boolean) type value resource param type help = TRUE see params available resource. n (int) number operation update starting first operation getted get_operations_all() function. page (int) page = 1 obtain data specific page (use , pagination = FALSE). pagination (boolean) TRUE obtain data page page FALSE default. page_start (int) page_start = 1 start page range obtain data (use , pagination = TRUE). page_end (int) page_end = 2 end page range obtain data (use , pagination = TRUE). benchmark (boolean) used measure performance system, benchmark = FALSE default. force (boolean) force update cache data, force = FALSE default. ignore_series (list) list operation identificators ignore. slow series cache : 16, 49, 330 334 tip (string) tip = M obtain metadata (crossing variables-values) series. det (int) det = 2 see two levels depth, specifically access PubFechaAct object, det = 0 default lang (string) language used obtain information

title: Update cache — update_cache
code: update_cache(resource = "series") update_cache(resource = "series", help = TRUE)
